spec_data.Name: perl-Text-Tabs+Wrap
spec_data.Description:
Text::Tabs performs the same job that the UNIX expand(1) and unexpand(1)
commands do: adding or removing tabs from a document.

Text::Wrap::wrap() will reformat lines into paragraphs. All it does is break
up long lines, it will not join short lines together.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 05:26:04 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Expand tabs and do simple line wrapping
